title: Remove phone number, address, and map from Contact page

requirements.summary: Remove phone number display from Contact page
acceptanceCriteria: Phone number is no longer visible on the Contact page
No phone-related UI elements remain in the contact information section

file_operations.description: Remove phone number display and any phone-related UI elements from the contact information section while preserving email contact information and maintaining the existing cartoon/neon styling

requirements.summary: Remove address display from Contact page
acceptanceCriteria: Venue address is no longer displayed on the Contact page
Location-related text content is removed from the contact information

file_operations.description: Remove venue address display and all location-related text content from the contact information section while maintaining the existing cartoon/neon styling for remaining elements

requirements.summary: Remove map display from Contact page
acceptanceCriteria: Map placeholder or embedded map is no longer visible on the Contact page
No map-related UI elements remain in the layout

file_operations.description: Remove map placeholder or embedded map component and any map-related UI elements from the page layout while preserving the overall Contact page structure and styling
